Title: Just a Pinch
Description:
Dust is the foundation of the art of enchantment. Where novice enchanters turn up their noses at such a common material, a master understands its versatility.

Bring me Storm Dust. No matter our expertise, we must always return to the fundamentals.
ObjectivesText: Collect 20 Storm Dust and deliver it to Nagad in Dornogal.
CompletionText: Have you collected the requisite dust?
RewardText: Gratitude. It is good to see a fellow enchanter who appreciates the basics.
